verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H1732><s%> Unto <S%H413><s%> thee will I cry, <S%H7121><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my rock; <S%H6697><s%> be not <S%H408><s%> silent <S%H2790><s%> to <S%H4480><s%> me: lest, <S%H6435><s%> if thou be silent <S%H2790><s%> to <S%H4480><s%> me, I become like <S%H4911><s%> <S%H5973><s%> them that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit. <S%H953><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications, <S%H8469><s%> when I cry <S%H7768><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, when I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> thy holy <S%H6944><s%> oracle. <S%H1687><s%>

Draw <S%H4900><s%> me not <S%H408><s%> away with <S%H5973><s%> the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> and with <S%H5973><s%> the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity, <S%H205><s%> which speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to <S%H5973><s%> their neighbors, <S%H7453><s%> but mischief <S%H7451><s%> is in their hearts. <S%H3824><s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> them according to their deeds, <S%H6467><s%> and according to the wickedness <S%H7455><s%> of their endeavors: <S%H4611><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> them after the work <S%H4639><s%> of their hands; <S%H3027><s%> render <S%H7725><s%> to them their desert. <S%H1576><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> they regard <S%H995><s%> <S%H413><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the works <S%H6468><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> nor the operation <S%H4639><s%> of his hands, <S%H3027><s%> he shall destroy <S%H2040><s%> them, and not <S%H3808><s%> build them up. <S%H1129><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he hath heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications. <S%H8469><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and my shield; <S%H4043><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> trusted <S%H982><s%> in him, and I am helped: <S%H5826><s%> therefore my heart <S%H3820><s%> greatly rejoiceth; <S%H5937><s%> and with my song <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7892><s%> will I praise <S%H3034><s%> him.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is their strength, <S%H5797><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> is the saving <S%H3444><s%> strength <S%H4581><s%> of his anointed. <S%H4899><s%>

Save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy people, <S%H5971><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> thine inheritance: <S%H5159><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> them also, and lift them up <S%H5375><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>
